content: four mandala fun is a simple way to showcase the beautiful colorways of lion brand mandala lion brand cupcake or lion brand mandala baby yarn this easy beginner-level pattern requires only double_crochet stitches us terms four cakes of mandala yarn or two mandala bonus bundles 2 360 yards or 2 160 meters makes a 47- by 66-inch blanket 119 by 168 cm a great size for a throw blanket for adults teens or kids or a bedspread for a twin size or single bed includes a little photo tutorial to make a symmetrical mirror-image blanket from two cakes of the same colorway and a little photo tutorial of the russian join method of adding a new cake or working around a knot for a smaller version of this blanket pattern check out two mandala tango https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/two-mandala-tango 1 share your blanket with #**fourmandalafun** on instagram please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern as long as you give design credit as four mandala fun crochet pattern by pretty peaceful not for commercial use please do not share photos of this pattern only share the link to the pattern pdf on ravelry or etsy thank you for your support 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/two-mandala-tango
